title: Consolidate Multiple Orders for Shipping
description: A single customer has placed multiple small orders that are all scheduled to ship on the same day. An agent needs to consolidate them into one shipment to save costs.

tasks.description: Identify all unshipped orders for a single customer with the same shipping date.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds three separate orders for the same customer.

tasks.description: Merge the three orders into a single consolidated shipment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully merges the orders in the warehouse management system.

tasks.description: Generate a single pick list and shipping label for the consolidated order.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates one pick list and one shipping label for the entire shipment.
